text: The following is a list of commuter rail systems in the United States, ranked by ridership. All figures come from the American Public Transportation Association's (APTA) Ridership Reports Statistics for the Fourth Quarter of 2019, unless otherwise indicated. __TOC__ ==List== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center;" !
